response.overview: The film tells the story of the heroine Xiao Bai Hu who offends someone who covets her beauty and meets the hero Murong Qu while avoiding being chased after by the soldiers. Murong Qu helps Xiao Bai Hu solve difficulties. Xiao Bai Hu hopes that Murong Qu can protect himself, and finally has an intersection with Murong Qu, but due to the vicious girlfriends, there are many misunderstandings between Xiao Bai Hu and Murong Qu.
response.title: Oh ! My prince !
